title: 2021–22 Maltese FA Trophy
text:
The 2021–22 <a href="Maltese%20FA%20Trophy">Maltese FA Trophy</a> (officially named "<a href="Izibet">Izibet</a> 2021-22 FA Trophy" due to sponsorship reasons, is the 84th edition of the <a href="association%20football">football</a> <a href="single-elimination%20tournament">cup competition</a>. The cup will begin on 7 December 2021. The winners of the Maltese FA Trophy will earn a place in the first qualifying round of the <a href="2022%E2%80%9323%20UEFA%20Europa%20Conference%20League">2022–23 UEFA Europa Conference League</a>.
There was no winner of the previous cup because the Malta FA Executive Committee cancelled the competition due to the <a href="COVID-19%20pandemic%20in%20Malta">COVID-19 pandemic in Malta</a>.
Preliminary round.
Fourteen preliminary round matches played on 7-9 December 2020. The draw for the preliminary round was held on 19 November 2021.
Round Of 32.
Sixteen Matches will be played on 8-10 February and 15-16 February. The draw for the Round Of 32 and Round of 16 was held on 8 January 2021.
Round Of 16.
The draw for the Round Of 32 and Round of 16 was held on 8 January 2021.
